
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52131864">
<font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65)"><font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot">高考蓝皮书·数学试题分析2025</font></font><br>
<font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, Apple Color Emoji, Segoe UI Emoji, Segoe UI Symbol"><font color="#a00015">高考蓝皮书·数学试题分析2025是由中国高考报告学术委员会编撰、现代教育出版社出版的权威资料。</font></font><br>
<font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, Apple Color Emoji, Segoe UI Emoji, Segoe UI Symbol"><font color="#a00015">该书紧扣高考评价体系，全面反映新课程、新教材、新高考理念，深入解读数学高考试题，</font></font><br>
<font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, Apple Color Emoji, Segoe UI Emoji, Segoe UI Symbol"><font color="#a00015">揭示命题意图和思维过程，提供科学化、精细化的高考备考指导。</font><br>
</font><br>
